author: dlydick
msg: Fixed bug in thread_new_common() where a (Code_attribute *) was not
being properly calculated.
Added thread_delete() function and reference it instead of explicit
marking of status block as ~THREAD_STATUS_INUSE.
Substitute portable_XXX() version of system calls and library calls.
Add java.lang.Thread object to new thread only after all
initialization is complete.
Updated ARCH_xxx() macros for better diagnostic support.
Minor documentation adjustments.

author: dlydick
msg: Added function method_parm_size() to evaluate the size of the JVM stack
area needed to hold the parameters of a virtual method.
Substitute portable_XXX() version of system calls and library calls.
Updated ARCH_xxx() macros for better diagnostic support.
Minor documentation adjustments.

author: dlydick
msg: Reversed the definition of local variable storage so that instead
of FP[0] being the first of 'n' local variables, FP[0 - n + 1] is
the first local variable and FP[0] is local 'n - 1'.
Updated ARCH_xxx() macros for better diagnostic support.
Minor documentation adjustments.

author: dlydick
msg: Added @todo item suggesting evaluation of implementing a suite
of GC_THREAD_xxx() macros, like GC_STACK_xxx() macros, instead
of using GC_OBJECT_xxX() macros in places in garbage collection.
Updated ARCH_xxx() macros for better diagnostic support.
Minor documentation adjustments.

author: cziegeler
msg: Remove AbstractUserProfileManager and AuthenticationProfileManager.
